rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0001
rows.name:
So you're the ones who took Kai
and Kei to their father in Iira?

rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0003
rows.name:
We led the refugee life together
for only a short while, but I
came to care about them.

rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0004
rows.name:
It's a great relief to
hear that they were reunited
with family... Truly.

rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0005
rows.name:
Maybe it isn't my position
to say, but... Thank you.

rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm glad they won't have to
live like this any longer.

rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0008
rows.name:
What if... What if I could become
a bit more like all of you...?

rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0009
rows.name:
I'd like to get my life back on track.
Live for something, give something
of myself and not just take...

rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, I'd like to try, anyway. You've
inspired me, you could say...

rows.label: tlk70000121_10_msg0011
rows.name:
So yeah! From now on, you're the targets
I'm shooting for! In a nice way, though.
Let's hope it all works out!
